reuters.title: MOODY'S AFFIRMS AVCO FINANCIAL'S LONG-TERM DEBT, CUTS COMMERCIAL PAPER
reuters.body: Sun Co's Sun Refining and Marketing Co subsidiary said it is decreasing the price it charges contract barge customers for heating oil in ny harbor by 0.50 cent a gallon, effective today. The 0.50 cent a gallon price reduction brings Sun's heating oil contract barge price to 50 cts a gallon, the company said. Reuter 
